name: Natalie Chen
text: Matt Burke is one of the most reliable and thoughtful engineers I’ve worked with. His ability to lead development while maintaining focus on user needs made a huge difference to our product.

name: Daniel Ortiz
text: Matt Burke consistently delivered high-quality, scalable code under tight deadlines. He’s pragmatic, communicates clearly, and made a big impact on our backend infrastructure.

name: Claire Donovan
text: We brought Matt in to architect a new microservices platform and he exceeded every expectation. His leadership and attention to performance optimization were exactly what we needed.

name: Marcus Reed
text: Matt Burke was instrumental in helping us modernize our tech stack. His ability to balance strategic thinking with hands-on delivery made him a standout partner.
